title: Can't spawn atlas without hands for drc_practice and vrc_final

content.html:
The approach for launching drcsim includes roslaunch parameters hand_suffix and model_args for all drc_practice and vrc_final launchfiles. This allows for various combinations of atlas _v3, _v4, _v5 models with _sandia_hands, _irobot_hands, and _robotiq_hands. It currently fails when trying to load models without hands.

An idea: create atlas_v1.launch to refer to the original atlas model, and make atlas_bringup.launch refer to hands-free models.

@jacquelinekay
